item.title: Integration with Zapier
item.description: Our integration with Zapier allows you to use our application together with all the other ones you use. Whether it’s email or a to-do application, trough Zapier we support it all!

item.title: List locations
item.description: An overview of all locations where inventory is stored. Fully searchable.

item.title: Pricing
item.description: To be determined once we are runnign in beta. Sign up for updates below!

item.title: Reports
item.description: Simple and useful reports generated automatically based on your data.

item.title: REST API for developers
item.description: A fully featured API that’s available for developers to hook into Organization.supply

item.title: Updates
item.description: Daily emails with inventory changes, users signups and other updates.

item.title: User management
item.description: Mulitple users support, invite only and managable trough a nice admin interface.

item.title: Whitelabel
item.description: Full customizable to fit the style of your organization. Including colors and logos.
